entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
